title: [IWJB] It Was Just Banter - Silver 'Team' - Looking For regular players that wanna have a laugh!
body:
Basically just Add and Message me on LoL. 
Its going to be a really casual team or Group. Not necessarily all about winning and climbing but more focused on having a good time and queuing with buddies. 
IGN: BearKind

Also post below with a little about yourself XD!

replies.body: So there is 6 of us in the group so far. Plenty of room for more!
